description: Enjoy a 100% authentic NFL game experience with real teams, real players and real action. Whether you’re are a fan of the Steelers, Cardinals or Cowboys, you can lead your favorite team through an entire season and battle for the ultimate prize: The Super Bowl.  - An officially licensed NFL videogame: Full teams rosters and the complete 2010 season  - Intuitive controls: Move your player with the virtual pad, perform moves by touching the appropriate icon, and punch a hole through the other team’s play!  - A large selection of playbooks with over 200 plays to choose from  - 3D graphics worthy of the best handheld console simulations with players and stadiums entirely modeled in 3D  - Audio commentary during the match  Don’t play football – live it.  Are you an NFL fan, or want to know everything about this game? Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NFL_2010
